meta.title: Dexon Training Center
meta.description: Dexon International Training Facilities have been established since 2009. Today the facilities include large and modern classrooms, a NDT training laboratory, rope access, wind energy training tower and pipeline training facilities. We continuously work on setting up new courses and trainings to meet the demands from the industry.

body.title: Dexon Training Center
